Name: Newcastle Jets bought by Maverick Sports Partners
Description: The Newcastle Jets football club will remain in the A-League men's and women's competition, with the side officially locking down a buyer.

Name: Kusini Yengi stars as Socceroos defeat Palestine 5-0
Description: Kerr, 30, had long been expected to re-commit to Chelsea, where she has played since 2019 and scored 99 goals in 128 matches.

Name: Matildas captain Sam Kerr signs two-year extension
Description: Matildas superstar captain Sam Kerr has re-signed with Chelsea until 2026 as she attempts to add more silverware to her trophy-laden time with the English powerhouse.

Name: England claims eight-wicket win over Oman
Description: England needed only 19 deliveries to reach its victory target against Oman and keep its men's T20 World Cup hopes alive in Antigua.

Name: McIlroy grouped with Scheffler & Schauffele
Description: Rory McIlroy (four), Scottie Scheffler (two) and Xander Schauffele (two) have won a combined seven majors. Scheffler is the standout favourite for the tournument after winning 16 times in the past 12 months.

Name: Pinehurst as tough a course as I have ever seen
Description: Scotland's Robert MacIntyre says this year's US Open host Pinehurst is 'as tough a course as I have ever seen'. MacIntyre is in prime form after winning the Canadian Open two weeks ago.

Name: McIlroy and Cantlay share US Open round one lead
Description: Rory McIlroy is the joint leader of the US Open alongside Patrick Cantlay after an intriguing first day at Pinehurst. North Carolina.

Name: England claims eight-wicket win over Oman
Description: England needed only 19 deliveries to reach its victory target against Oman and keep its men's T20 World Cup hopes alive in Antigua.
